entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -14.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
